text: The value of a road is calculated as noise_at_point(road_middle) + detriment where a lower value gives higher priority. The term detriment is only relevant for larger main roads, and is then calculated as runLQads detriment_range — distance(road, roads[n]) ‘ Z _— =~ x detriment;mpact = detriment_range where roads are the main roads already placed within detriment_range and detriment;mpact is the magnitude of the detriment.
